articles.description: Ireland dismantle Scotland to reach the World Cup quarter-finals and send their opponents crashing out of the tournament.
articles.title: Imperious Ireland reach quarters as Scots crash out

articles.description: Max Verstappen entered the rarefied realm of triple Formula 1 world champions with a hard-fought second place in the sprint race at the Qatar Grand Prix on Saturday.
articles.title: 'Verstappen as close as it gets to unbeatable'

articles.description: Scott McTominay produced heroics to give Manchester United victory over Brentford and manager Erik ten Hag hopes it will be the catalyst for a club "reset" this season.
articles.title: Ten Hag lauds match-winner McTominay with 'Man Utd heart'

articles.description: Live coverage of the Bellator 300 in San Diego.
articles.title: Bellator MMA - Bellator 300

articles.description: England flirt with defeat in their final Pool D game, but survive to keep their winning World Cup run intact.
articles.title: England sleepwalk into last eight with Samoa escape

articles.description: Watch live coverage of the MLB Saturday Showdown, with the eight remaining play-off teams playing the first game of the Division Series.
articles.title: Watch: MLB Saturday Showdown - four back-to-back play-off games

articles.description: WBA champion Leigh Wood makes a dramatic comeback to stop Josh Warrington in Sheffield.
articles.title: Wood stops Warrington for dramatic comeback win

articles.description: Watch highlights of South Africa's innings as they post 428-5 against Sri Lanka in Delhi, the highest score in World Cup history.
articles.title: SA hit record World Cup total against Sri Lanka

articles.description: Watch the key moments as Ireland beat Scotland, Wales see off Georgia, and England narrowly defeat Samoa at the Rugby World Cup.
articles.title: Wins for England, Wales and Ireland at Rugby World Cup

articles.description: In setting a new record score at a World Cup, South Africa have shown they are contenders and can banish the pain of the past.
articles.title: 'South Africa show they are World Cup contenders'
